phrases: I always dreamed that you would one day be my girlfriend,
One of these days I will declare my love for you, and ask you to be my girlfriend.
Please think about how you will answer me.
It was only obligatory chocolate, anyway.
You are in your second year of high school, yet you still yawn in the morning?
As they say, When hibernating, one sleeps a sleep that knows no dawn, idiot.
It is not hibernation, it is spring.
In spring, one sleeps a sleep that knows no dawn.
Well, I guess you can put it that way, too.
Atsushi-kun needs to grow a widdle bit bigger, does not he?
Yeah, hold still for a sec.
What are you, an animal loving old man?
You are a good boy, are not you.
Do not pick on girls, okay?
You are hopeless when it comes to dealing with females,
A genius when it comes to dealing with males?
You do not need to worry about my name.
What is everyone gathered around for?
It is the new class list.
We are in the same class again.
I am by myself in the class next door though.
But Chiharu-chan, you and Suzuki-kun are in the same class.
I am in the same class as you.
Darling, we are in the same class again!
I am in the same class as you again?!
When will I be able to shake being known as one of the half of All Hanshin-Kyojin?!
Just grow a little more, and eveything will be fine.
Why do not you try shrinking?!
Do not ask for the impossible!
It feels like we have not changed at all,
We have the same homeroom teacher again, too.
This is his doing, is not it?!
Otani is my natural enemy, but...
Could it be that I... towards Otani...
There seems to be a familiar name in the class next door.
One of these days I will declare my love for you, and ask you to be my girlfriend.
Even though the chocolate you gave me on Valentine's Day was only obligatory chocolate,
But I did not get placed in the same class as you.
You said that you were going to transfer to this school in April, huh.
Do not tell me you forgot all about me, Risa?!
How could I do a thing like that?!
I am not that forgetful, you know!
It is not like that at all...
Risa, if you do not hurry, you will miss the opening ceremony.
So Haruka, I will see you later,'kay?
Let go of me, you giant!
I just thought I would be in your way.
A husband and wife double act.
And in the same breath, too.
Otani and I will be in the same class together for one more year.
So he is a senpai at my school?
Now, we are supposed to decide on the general representatives and what have you...
But it is always a pain, so we will just vote for class reps first,
Do not make eye contact with that old man, Koizumi.
Well then, why do not we pick Koizumi and Otani,
Sorry to bring this up now,
Why do not you two go help out?
So these two were the famous All Hanshin-Kyojin back in the first year?
Just consider this a continuation of last year.
Where do you think you are going?
They are arranging things for the opening ceremony in the gym right now.
Where are you going to play basketball?
We are going to practice in the park!
What about helping out for the ceremony?!
I do not have time for stuff like that right now.
I am going to be a regular on the basketball team this year.
It was decided during spring break.
He is the only second-year on the team.
You do not need to say that.
He is the number-one candidate to be the next team captain.
I told you not to say stuff like that, did not I?
That is right... he is worked so hard...
This and that are two different things.
It is your fault for accepting the job as class rep in the first place.
As a man, I would be uncool if I did not accept in that kind of situation.
Even if that is the case, do not drag me into it if you are just showing off!
You are such a pain in the ass!
All right everyone, thank you for your hard work.
The first-years are already trickling in.
They are all in crisp new uniforms.
It looks like they are fresh off the shelf.
You came to our opening ceremony in a really cute casual outfit,
Ahh, that was just because I did not have my uniform at the time.
What do you mean you do not have a uniform yet?
Even if you did not get your uniform in time for the opening ceremony,
I got this really cute top yesterday,
Even if it is, today is not the day to wear it!
And on the first day of school, too.
I mean, when I get as old as you,
I have to wear them as often as I can while I am still young,
Who are you calling an old lady?!
Oh... I did not mean you, Sensei.
Some boys are fighting over there!
Senpai, you are the one from this morning.
That teacher is really strict so be careful, okay?
If you let her, she will lecture you for a whole hour.
I am going to get going.
Why do I have to come shopping with you?
I will not lose to those new girls.
Do not let them bother you.
You do not have to treat them as your rivals.
But still, it is not like you have got money to spare.
I do not give my rich granny a shoulder rub every night for nothing.
Aww, this would really suit Otani.
I am going to be a regular on the basketball team this year.
I am going to buy that!
I told you, It is a present.
It has to be a trap, right?!
Ah, I see what you are doing.
You want the signed Umibouzu CD that I found in that used CD store.
Like hell I will give it to you!
That is not it at all!
I was just giving you a present since you are a regular on the basketball team now.
But if you do not want it, give it back!
I just felt like getting it for you.
I am starting to think it is more than just a height problem.
If only I could make myself cuter.
You are talking like a young maiden in love all of a sudden.
Thanks for the help during opening ceremony.
But this girl is just so sweet!
Are you two in any clubs?
Are you going to join any?
They are holding an introduction for the various clubs in the gym tomorrow.
I was going to check them out and then decide.
Oh, Darling said he was going to dress in black for that.
What kind of introduction is the basketball club going to be doing?
I think Otani-kun will be making an appearance, too.
I will be sure to check out the basketball club, then!
Girls that cute exist in this world...
Is it really okay for us to skip class to watch this?
It is not fair that people in clubs get to miss class.
And I want to see my darling dressed in black, anyway.
So, what is with this dressing in black thing?
We, the boys basketball club, currently have eleven members.
We are a great club, ranked quite highly within the region.
Even if you are not that good, I am sure you will improve!
Okay everyone, please turn around and look behind you!
Even that short boy over there...
After joining our club, he can now perform a slam dunk.
I did not want to see my boyfriend doing that!
See, even a shortie can slam dunk.
I am sure his mama would be overjoyed.
Height is not a problem, so you can join even if you are short.
What the heck was that just now?
You should not have come to watch.
It was not fun at all.
We were just trying to recruit new members.
Our training really is strict, so a lot of people quit right away.
We just want more poeple to start off.
I wonder if you will get anyone with such a lame-ass stunt.
Oh, it is that girl from before.
You know, that girl who was hassled by that dog on her first day.
I am going to smack you!
Senpai, that dunk just now, it was really cool!
My body tends to move before I can think.
You did not want me to do that, did you?
Uh, it is not really like that.
This might be kind of weird after that...
If you want, we can start out as friends...
I have captured Seiko-chan's heart so easily.
I do not have a comeback...
